targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
  finance_categories.name as "Income",
  sum(amount) as "Total"
from finance_transactions
JOIN finance_categories ON finance_transactions.category = finance_categories.id
where $__timeFilter(date)
and (finance_categories.name = 'Income' or parent_category = 71)

SELECT 
  finance_categories.name "Name",
  sum(amount) as "Total"
from finance_transactions
JOIN finance_categories ON finance_transactions.category = finance_categories.id
where $__timeFilter(date)
and (finance_categories.name = 'Lawn & Garden')

SELECT 
  finance_categories.name "Name",
  sum(amount) as "Total"
from finance_transactions
JOIN finance_categories ON finance_transactions.category = finance_categories.id
where $__timeFilter(date)
and (finance_categories.name = 'Pet Food & Supplies')
